data.title: Home
data.text:
The E.C. Brooks Elementary Team Members are committed to developing a community of learners who are academically proficient, demonstrate strong character, and exhibit self-confidence. We strive to ensure that Brooks students achieve high standards of academic, emotional, and social success for all students in an exemplary, child centered, safe, and supportive teaching and learning community. We commit to preparing our students to function in a technologically advanced society by developing 21st century skills, while promoting hands-on experiences and project-based learning opportunities.

Our E.C. Brooks Community Members know how to R.O.A.R. by being R-Respectful, O-Open Minded, A-Acting Safely, and R-Responsible!
